SELECT mi.id, mi.send_user AS sendUser, mi.take_user AS takeUser, mi.content, mi.create_date AS createDate, ui1.name AS sendUserName, ui1.images AS sendUserAvatar, ui2.name AS takeUserName, ui2.images AS takeUserAvatar FROM message_info mi LEFT JOIN staff_info ui1 ON ( ui1.id = mi.send_user ) LEFT JOIN staff_info ui2 ON ( ui2.id = mi.take_user ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.sendUserName},'%')
AND ui2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.takeUserName},'%')
ORDER BY mi.create_date DESC

SELECT mi.send_user AS sendUser, mi.take_user AS takeUser, mi.content, mi.create_date AS createDate, ui1.name AS sendUserName, ui1.images AS sendUserAvatar, ui2.name AS takeUserName, ui2.images AS takeUserAvatar FROM (SELECT * FROM message_info WHERE create_date IN (SELECT MAX(create_date) FROM message_info WHERE take_user = #{ userId } OR send_user = #{ userId } GROUP BY CONCAT( IF (send_user > take_user, send_user, take_user), IF (send_user < take_user, send_user, take_user))) ORDER BY create_date DESC) mi LEFT JOIN staff_info ui1 ON (ui1.id = mi.send_user) LEFT JOIN staff_info ui2 ON (ui2.id = mi.take_user) ORDER BY mi.create_date DESC

SELECT mi.task_status AS takeStatus, mi.send_user AS sendUser, mi.take_user AS takeUser, mi.content, mi.create_date AS createDate, ui1.name AS sendUserName, ui1.images AS sendUserAvatar, ui1.user_id AS sendUserId, ui2.name AS takeUserName, ui2.user_id AS takeUserId, ui2.images AS takeUserAvatar FROM (SELECT * FROM message_info WHERE send_user = #{ sendUser } AND take_user = #{ takeUser } UNION SELECT * FROM message_info WHERE send_user = #{ takeUser } AND take_user = #{ sendUser }) mi LEFT JOIN staff_info ui1 ON (ui1.id = mi.send_user) LEFT JOIN staff_info ui2 ON ( ui2.id = mi.take_user ) ORDER BY mi.create_date ASC

select ci.id, ci.send_user, ci.take_user, ci.`task_status`, ci.content, ci.create_date,
ei2.name, ei2.images
ei.name, ei.images
from message_info ci
left join staff_info ei on (ei.id = ci.send_user)
left join staff_info ei2 on (ei2.id = ci.take_user)
where 1 = 1
and ci.take_user = #{userId}
and ci.send_user = #{userId}
group by ci.send_user
group by ci.take_user
order by create_date desc

select mi.id, mi.send_user, mi.take_user, mi.`task_status`, mi.content, mi.create_date, ei.name as expertName, ei.images as expertImages, ei2.name as enterpriseName, ei2.images as enterpriseImages from (select * from message_info where send_user = #{ expertCode } AND take_user = #{ enterpriseCode }) mi left join staff_info ei on (ei.id = mi.send_user) left join staff_info ei2 on (ei2.id = mi.take_user) ORDER BY mi.create_date asc
